movie_title: Are you getting enough exercise? 6 Minute English
introduction: Study English with us as look at the health benefits of exercise and examine some key vocabulary aro

vocabulary.definition: using a lot of energy to do something
vocabulary.example: I am running vigorously on the spot!

vocabulary.definition: to walk slowly in a relaxed way
vocabulary.example: When I saw Rob, I sauntered over to say hello.
It’s important to take some brisk exercise every day.

vocabulary.definition: sitting a lot and not taking much exercise
vocabulary.example: It’s bad for your health to lead such a sedentary lifestyle.
The company has been making incremental changes to its pay structure.
It’s important to build regular exercise into your daily routine.
